Q4 FY25 Results & Dividend:

BDL's Board of Directors will be meeting onMay 27, 2025, to consider and approve the audited financial results for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2025.

They will also consider a final dividend, if any, for the financial year 2024-25 at this meeting.

Note:The trading window for BDL securities is currently closed from April 1, 2025, and will remain so until 48 hours after the declaration of the Q4 and FY25 results.

Record Turnover:

BDL announced a record turnover during the financial year 2024-25. This was announced on April 3, 2025.

BDL is recruiting for various trainee positions (Engineer, Officer, Diploma Assistant, and Assistant).

The company has announced its Q4 FY25 financial results on July 12, 2025, and Q1 FY26 financial results on August 13, 2025. However, based on the date provided in the request (May 1, 2025), these results haven't been released yet.

BDL is working on indigenizing its critical component ecosystem to overcome supply chain issues.

BDL continues to focus on exports, particularly for products like the Akash missile, light weight torpedoes, and Konkours missile.
